org.encog.ml.data.buffer

Class EncogEGBFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.encog.ml.data.buffer.EncogEGBFile

  • public class EncogEGBFile
extends Object
    Used to access an Encog Binary Training file (*.EGB).
